title: The Tech Wreck Continues
description:
Meta stock slides on weak earnings. Microsoft posts lackluster cloud revenue. And Ford beats expectations, but dims long-term outlook.



Host: Jackson Cantrell.

$META, $MSFT, $F, $SNOW, $MDB
